basic_info.description: Hi - My name is Elaine. I’m an aspiring software engineer hoping to become a full-stack developer with a background in web technologies. Currently, I am proficient in Javascript, utilizing frameworks such as React for front-end development. I’m looking to strengthen my knowledge in my upcoming courses and gain experience building back-end applications.

projects.title: To Do List
projects.description: Building a to do list application using React, I created a productivity tool for users to create, edit, and delete tasks. Users can filter through tasks created and cross off completed tasks.

projects.title: Egg Timer
projects.description: My First application built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I created an egg timer for users to cook eggs. This application features egg specifications to select (size, temperature, cook type) to calculate the ideal boil time.

projects.title: Flash Flip
projects.description: Built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. My team and I created a flash card app modeled after Quizlet. Creating features for users to create a deck of flashcards and quiz themselves using an interactive flashcard.
